price: Kandi n’ikimenyetso kuri bo ni ijoro; turikuraho (umucyo w’) amanywa maze bakaba mu mwijima.
arabic: وَءَايَةٞ لَّهُمُ ٱلَّيۡلُ نَسۡلَخُ مِنۡهُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فَإِذَا هُم مُّظۡلِمُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: waāyatun lahumu al-laylu naslakhu min'hu al-nahāra fa-idhā hum muẓ'limūna
